name: 4 in a Row - Deluxe
description:
You can get so much fun from 4 in a Row - Deluxe!

4 in a Row is a two-player game and the object of the game is to connect four of one's own discs of the same color next to each other vertically, horizontally, or diagonally before your opponent. 3 AI levels of gameplay against the computer, or against your friend on same or different devices! This strategy board game let you keep having fun as well as improve your levels.


*Features*

1. Three levels of play, meeting needs of all players.

2. Play against a nearby player via Bluetooth or your friend on the same device with Two Players mode.

3. Enable to save game progress and load it next time.

4. Great visual effect and exciting sound effects.



*Rules*

4 in a Row(Four in a Row) also known as Captain's Mistress, Four Up(4 Up), Plot Four(Plot 4), Find Four(Find 4), Fourplay(4play), and Four in a Line(4 in a line).
In this game, players first choose a color, then two players take turns to put the pieces on the game board. The player whoever first lets the 4 pieces in a row vertically, horizontally or diagonally is the winner.
